column4: University of Ghent in Belgium divests and cuts ties with Israeli research centers after student mobilization

Indigenous knowledge is how we must move forward to live. 

Repost from @congofriends
•
“Basandja centers around ancestral ecology ⬇️

which is an approach that revives ancient Indigenous knowledge as a practice that advocates for a holistic understanding of, and connection with, the earth.

Here the earth is seen not merely as a repository of material resources but as a holobiont, an ensemble of closely associated species interlinked through complex symbiotic relationships that hold the entirety of life systems in balance.

The story unfolds as a profound journey into the soul of the Isangi community and Tolaw villagers to map an ancient exchange with the forest that spans millennia.”
.
.
This text is an excerpt from an article that our friends over at @terralingua.langscape published recently.

The article is an excellent exploration of what Basandja looks like in practice, as well as a fantastic behind-the-scenes into the upcoming Basandja film that documents what how indigenous wisdom is being leveraged at the grassroots level—

from the rainforests to the mines—

to bring about the changes Congolese people need.
.
.
Check out the article at terralingua.org/langscape_articles/basandja/ (or Google “terralingua basandja”)

Also be sure to check out the trailer for Basandja at basandjafilm.org.

There is nothing greater than Jewish Joy.  And THIS, right here...THIS is Jewish Joy. ⁠
⁠
I’m throwing it back to last weekend, celebrating my best friend’s daughter’s bat mitzvah.  My best friend who I met in 6th grade, and  became friends with as media center aids in the 8th grade. (We were in charge of the reference section...swipe all the way ➡️ for proof.) ⁠
⁠
We became friends at the same age our daughters are now. ⁠
⁠
But last weekend, despite all the darkness in the world around us, the light came on and we celebrated BIG TIME. Together with many of our friends from growing up and college, we put all of the Jewish Joy on the table. ⁠
⁠
One of the most special parts about this weekend is that this friend of mine is the one who taught me to appreciate what it means to be Jewish. 

This is a friend who listened to David Broza or Debbie Friedman, while most of us got into our cars in high school and popped in a mixed tape filled with @Phish (or that other band we no longer listen to.)
⁠
This is a friend who has more friends who are rabbis than most people have friends (which inherently means I do too...), and that makes us both incredibly #blessed. ⁠
⁠
She instilled in me the value of going to temple, knowing the meaning of the prayers and the importance of surrounding myself with Jewish community.  Ultimately, she was the one who convinced me to go on the trip that changed my life forever, @motlorg.⁠
⁠
And so celebrating the bat mitzvah my daughter in October and her daughter this past weekend, TOGETHER, has meaning beyond no other. And rght now, there is simply nothing better than a Jewish milestone celebration.  So find yourself a friend who’s having a bar or bat mitzvah...or one who’s getting married. ⁠
⁠
You will walk away with your heart filled in a way that I promise will carry you far into the next week and beyond. ⁠
⁠
And do you want to know the best part?  I get to do it all over again in a week...and then again three weeks later.  All with my oldest, dearest and closest of friends from growing up.
⁠
We are so damn lucky. #AmYisraelChai⁠
📸 @lefko76
⁠
#barmitzvah #mitzvah #batmitzvah #mazeltov #oldfriendsarethebestfriends #throwbackthursday

Fri. 5/31 — Help us welcome back Yahya Ashour, young and profound Gazan poet, as he sits in conversation with writer, translator, and UPenn Associate Professor of Arabic Literature, Huda J. Fakhreddine.

The two will talk through Yahya’s works and life.

A grounding opening poetry reading will be recited by one of our cherished Philly student movement-makers, Nada Abuasi.

This event is a fundraiser to help Yahya directly support his family’s evacuation costs, and our fundraising goal is $5000 — enough to cover only one adult’s fee, for now.

Please pay whatever you’re able to! (No one will be turned away)

🎟️ RSVP at link in bio.

Succulent & Easy-to-make pasta 🍝

🎥: @joandbart

Follow @recxipes for more🍝

Ingredients (for 2):

-A drizzle of olive oil
-3 cloves of garlic
-1 shallot
-2 tbsp tomato paste
-spices : salt, pepper, pili-pili, parsley
-à bit of pasta cooking water
-double cream - 100 ml
-uncooked rigatoni- 200g
-100g mozzarella (less or more depending on your taste)
-Basil for the topping

Instructions:

•Brown garlic and shallots in olive oil.

•Add the tomato paste and spices. Stir.

•Add pasta cooking water, cream and stir.

•Add the cooked pasta and stir.

•Add the mozzarella and stir.

•It’s ready and you can add mozzarella as you like and top with basil.  •if you want the sauce to be more homogeneous you can add butter and stir again

Bon appétit !

کوفته مرغ 

مواد لازم:
2 تکه سینه مرغ
1 مشت جعفری خرد شده
4_3 قاشق غذاخوری آرد سوخاری
1 قاشق مرباخوری نمک
1 قاشق مرباخوری پودر سیر(یک دو حبه سیر رنده شده هم میشه)
1 قاشق چای خوری فلفل سیاه
1 قاشق چای خوری آویشن
1 قاشق چای خوری پودر فلفل قرمز
1 عدد فلفل کاپیای قرمز ریز خرد شده
2_1 عدد فلفل سبز ریز خرد شده
1 عدد پیاز قرمز ریز خرد شده
4_3 قاشق غذاخوری روغن مایع

طرز تهیه :
مرع و جعفری را داخل غذاساز میکس کنید و داخل ظرفی بریزید. آرد سوخاری ، نمک و ادویه ها، پیاز و فلفل‌های خرد شده و روغن مایع را اضافه کنید و خوب ورز دهید. روی طرف را بپوشانید و 1 ساعت در یخچال بذارید. سپس بیرون آورده و داخل روغن داغ پشت و رو خوب سرخ کنید. 
دوست داشتین؟

סלמון שלם טרי אפוי בתנור, מנה סופר חגיגית בכלום ושום דבר עבודה!! שבוע שעבר קפצתי לחצי חינם ואמאלהה איזה מבצעים שווים יש לחג😱 סלמון נורבגי טרי ב 89.90 לק״ג, כתף כבש טרי ב 89.90 לק״ג, אנטריקוט טרי ב 99 שח ועוד המון..טוסו לשם ודברו איתי אחרי🤭
למתכון👇👇
.

המרכיבים:
נתח סלמון טרי שלם
5-6 יח תפוחי אדמה שטופים בקליפתם
כפית צ׳ילי גרוס
כפית שטוחה מלח ים אטלנטי/אחר
חצי כפית פלפל שחור 
4 כפות שמן זית

לרוטב:
רבע צרור כוסברה קצוץ
רבע צרור פטרוזיליה קצוץ 
3 שיניי שום מגורדות
2 כפות שקדים טחונים
כף וחצי מיונז
כפית חרדל דיז׳ון
כף צ׳ילי גרוס חריף/מתוק
2 כפות סילאן טבעי
לימון שלם סחוט
2 כפות שמן זית
כפית מלח (לפי טעם)

אופן ההכנה:
מחממים תנור ל 220 מעלות חום סטטי
פורסים את תפוחי האדמה במנדולינה/סכין לפרוסות דקות.
מעבירים לקערה ומתבלים במלח,פלפל, צ׳ילי ושמן זית.
מערבבים היטב ומעבירים לתבנית התנור.
בעזרת הידיים משטחים לשכבה אחידה.
.
חורצים את פילה הסלמון באלכסונים.
מניחים את כל מרכיבי הרוטב בקערה ומערבבים היטב.
מורחים את הנתח ברוטב ומקפידים להכניס בין החריצים.
מורחים גם את תפוחי האדמה.
מכניסים לתנור ל 25 דקות בערך או עד שהנתח מוכן והזהיב.

🧋NEW BOBA ALERT🧋

Fresh off the plane from Taiwan, @comebuytea_seattle is the newest boba shop in town. Their Teapresso Machines brew a fresh cup of tea for every order, meaning you’re not drinking tea that’s been sitting for hours! Watching the steam and noise of each drink being made was like being in Willy Wonka’s factory. 

This is only the second ComeBuyTea location in the USA, so 📍Capitol Hill should feel pretty special! I strongly recommend ordering a tea based drink, like their Hong Kong Milk Tea or the Sun Moon Lake Black Tea. I’m not sure what they put in their waffle batter, but you absolutely cannot miss it. The mango waffle was the highlight for me, and I’m intrigued by the corn & ham waffle. Add ComeBuyTea to your list of favorite boba shops to hit before a night out in Capitol Hill 😉💌

4 months of progress - comment or DM “schedule” for my workout schedule 🤍

consistent sloppy action will always beat “once in a while” perfection

I used to think that unless the workout was 30+ minutes, it “doesn’t count” - so as I entered the world of motherhood, it became harder and harder to feel like I was accomplishing something as my time for me became less and less. 

Now being a mom of 2 I can proudly say that I have recognized that consistent short, or even easy workout sessions have CARRIED me to my goals. 

Of course every once in a while I have more time available to me, but as a general rule I now know that even if the workout is 10 minutes or “just a stretch”, it’s contributing to my consistency streak.

If you’re a few weeks or even a few months into your journey and you feel like you’ve been consistent but haven’t seen any changes, don’t stop because it’s “not working”, keep going and adjust to your personal needs. 

You WILL reach your goals. 

Here’s what you can do step by step:
1. Make a mental note of your set workout time (Monday- Friday), and create a backup time for the days something comes up to change your schedule 
2. Comment or DM “schedule” so you have my exact momday to Friday schedule to follow so you’re never guessing what workout to do
3. Set a goal of at least 2 weeks of consistency, even if it means swapping out the scheduled workout for a short stretch. Make that streak happen 👏🏽
4. Join our accountability calls on growwithjo home to ignite your motivation, ask questions, learn more about how to customize your nutrition, and feel less alone. 

I know life is crazy and you’ve tried this many times before. 

This is your opportunity to do things differently and finally get consistent. 

#motivation #weightloss #transformation

Hi!

3 min en scène VS 3 semaines de travail 🥵

En arrivant à l’ @opera_comique j’avais comme mission de trouver comment vieillir les deux solistes sur scène à vue, l’idée était que plus le temps passe, plus les cheveux et poils poussent.
Il fallait trouver un moyen simple pour qu’ils puissent se mettre les perruques et postiches seuls sous le regard du public. Après beaucoup de réflexion et sous les conseils d’ @amelie_lecul , nous avons opté pour le système à aimants. Chaque élément vient s’aimanter à l’autre de manière très simple. 
Mais, pour que tout soit simple visuellement, on s’est heurté à beaucoup de questionnements : Comment placer les aimants ? Combien ? Comment faire la jonction entre chaque postiche ? ..

Il a fallut 3 semaines de travail en atelier pour fabriquer ces éléments de vieillissement. Chaque perruque et postiches ont été fabriqués sur mesure pour notre soliste @stephane.degout, les couleurs ont été minutieusement réfléchies, la coupe également, tout a été pensé pour qu’il puisse le plus simplement poser ces éléments sur lui, sans miroir. 

Un grand merci à mon équipe d’atelier, sans qui rien aurait été possible ! ✨
Perruque : @deborahwigmaker 
Barbe 1 :  @nell_cvr 
Toupet court : @artist_wig 
Barbe 2 : @corinne.blot.mua 
Toupet long : @charlenewigmakeup_ 
Barbe 3 : @___nnine___ 

Sans oublier @wysi_wig qui s’est occupé des postiches de @siobhanstagg, merci pour ton travail 🫶🏻

L’autre Voyage de Schubert
Direction musicale Raphaël Pichon • Mise en scène et décors Silvia Costa • Costumes Laura Dondoli • Avec Stéphane Degout, Siobhan Stagg, Laurence Kilsby, Chadi Lazreq • Orchestre et Chœur Pygmalion • Chœur d’enfants Maîtrise Populaire de l’Opéra-Comique
🤍MIREL🤍

My heart has been melting for maternity sessions lately, and these two REALLY REASSURED ME OF IT. LIKE CMON. THEY ARE SO CUTE. 😭🥲😍

Ellie and Anthony have one of the most incredible stories. They first met at the church they both attended, but they did not bond until later. During 2018, their young adults group went on a mission trip to the Dominican Republic to work with children who had HIV/AIDS. And guess who both went 😉

When they first arrived, it was the same as usual, they didn’t really talk. Fast forward to the last few days of the trip, they finally connected. And man, that connection was STRONG, because the rest was history… They stayed up as a group late into the night where Ellie and Anthony got to talk in depth for the first time 🥰

Their very first date was in Princeton. Sushi date plus walking around equals a perfect night, right?! Like that’s definitely my vision of a perfect night! 🍣😍 Even though Ellie grew up in Princeton, that was Anthony’s first time ever going. Ellie showed him the best ice cream, Halo Pub, and then showed him around the beautiful university. Fast forward 5 years, they got married in Princeton 🥹

Along with Princeton being their favorite spot ever, their favorite drink to get together is some good ole kung fu tea. I mean now I’m craving milk tea ;,) Some fun facts about them is that Anthony likes laying on the floor, while Ellie likes to eat bananas while they’re still green. They’re iconic, these two. ☺️ Along with their special quirks together, they have a secret handshake. I don’t think it’s possible for them to be cuter…

These two wanted to capture the joy of welcoming their daughter into this world. They got married in August 2023, and are now ecstatic to bring their precious daughter into the world, any day now. It was an absolute joy sharing these moments with them. May God bless them on their new journey together with their daughter. I truly feel like God’s love shines off these two, and I am so honored to share these precious photos. 🥹
